title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, LLM, embeddings and tool-calling inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into the editor as a free local copilot with inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/JVM client for Ollama (Spring Boot starter included) supporting streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; same generate/chat/embed API as the Python/JS clients.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-liner commands to run Ollama in a container.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot UI that talks to Ollama via the OpenAI-compatible endpoint; deploy to Vercel in one click.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: Collection of GitHub Actions workflows that automate model pulling, benchmarking and nightly integration tests for Ollama.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline; supports code blocks and markdown.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and embedding support; available on NuGet.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on Linux/macOS with GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams answers from Ollama models into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for local AI-assisted note writing and summarization.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Experimental Terraform provider to declaratively manage Ollama models and prompts as infrastructure.
